about.title: About Cubita Producciones
about.description: We are a booking agency with over 30 years of experience in the European market, specializing in the representation and promotion of international artists in salsa and reggaeton genres.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Cubita Producciones is a leading booking agency in representing Cuban artists in Europe. With over three decades of experience, we have consolidated relationships with major festivals and promoters across the continent.
about.missionText: Connecting top-tier Cuban talent with European audiences, offering authentic and memorable musical experiences.
about.ctaSubtitle: Contact us today and discover how we can make your event a success
